help-file.title: "DURIS INFORMATION" INFORMATION
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all available help that pertains to Duris as a MUD, and other miscellaneous information you may wish to read. An asterisk beside an entry indicates that there is more help available on that entry. Type "help <entry>" for more information.
Example: "help races" will bring up an explanation of races, a list of all the available ones, and how to obtain further help on each one.
AREA MAKING CALENDAR MONTHS WORLD CLASSES CREDITS DAYS INNATE MOTD NEWBIE MUD NEWS RACES RACEWARS PKILL TIME WIZLIST ZONES
